import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client'; import { Component, ChangeEvent } from "react"; import WellService from "../services/WellService"; import IWellData from '../types/Wells'; import {Routes, Route, Link} from "react-router-dom"; import Boreholes from "../elements/WellsList"; class SearchBox extends React.Component { public render(){ return (

); } } function clearFilterInput(arg0: string): React.MouseEventHandler | undefined { const e=document.getElementById(arg0) as HTMLInputElement; if (e){ e.value=" "; } return } //opSelectionChanged function opSelectionChanged(arg0: string): React.ChangeEventHandler | undefined { const e=document.getElementById(arg0) as HTMLInputElement; if (e){ e.value=" "; } return } function textChanged(arg0: string): React.KeyboardEventHandler | undefined { const e=document.getElementById(arg0) as HTMLInputElement; if (e){ e.value=" "; } return } function filterSearch(arg0: boolean): React.MouseEventHandler | undefined { console.log("apiResult"); const result=document.getElementById('SearchResult'); /*const list=document.createElement("Routes"); const list1=document.createElement("Route"); list1.setAttribute('path',"/boreholes"); list1.setAttribute('element',"{}"); result?.appendChild(list); list.appendChild(list1); */ console.log(result?.innerText); if(document.getElementById('compareAPI') && document.getElementById('API') && result){ const apiValue=document.getElementById('API')!.innerText.toString; const apiOperation=document.getElementById('compareAPI')!.innerText; if (apiOperation==="="){ const apiResult=WellService.getAPI(apiValue); result!.innerHTML +=apiResult; console.log(apiResult); } } console.log("apiResult33"); //arg0==true, then append new result to the current one if (arg0){ } //else, get new search return } function exportToCsv(arg0: string): React.MouseEventHandler | undefined { return } export default SearchBox;
